AND A.healthtitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sch_healthtitle},'%')

mapper.select:
SELECT A.healthindex, A.healthtitle, A.regid, B.name, B.telephone, B.handphone, B.job, B.specialty, B.belongto, B.career, A.thumbnailfile, A.healthcontent, DATE_FORMAT( A.regtime,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') "regtime" FROM health A LEFT OUTER JOIN special_member B ON A.regid = B.specialid
ORDER BY A.regtime DESC
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS cnt FROM health A
SELECT MAX(healthindex) AS lastIndex FROM health A
SELECT MAX(sequencenum) AS lastFileIndex FROM health_file A
mapper.insert:
